get.description: Retrieves the account information of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Updates the account information of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a JWT token upon successful login. The token should be included in subsequent requests as a Bearer token in the Authorization header.
Creates a new user account after validating email and username uniqueness. The password must meet strong password requirements, and the username must follow specific constraints.

get.description: Retrieves the user's daily caloric target and current progress
Retrieves all caloric intake logs for the current user

post.description: Records a new caloric intake entry
Records caloric intake from a specific recipe
Creates a new dietary plan with specified caloric targets and preferences

get.description: Retrieves all dietary plans for the current user

200.description: List of dietary plans retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a specific dietary plan by ID

delete.description: Removes a dietary plan by ID

post.description: Creates a new recipe with the provided details including ingredients, instructions, and nutritional information

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available recipes

post.description: Search recipes using various criteria with cursor-based pagination

get.description: Retrieves personalized recipe recommendations based on user preferences and history
Retrieves all recipes liked by the current user with pagination
Retrieves a curated list of featured recipes
Retrieves detailed information about a specific recipe

patch.description: Updates an existing recipe with new information

delete.description: Removes a recipe from the system

post.description: Creates a new post with the provided content and associates it with a recipe

value.content: This recipe was amazing! Will definitely make it again.

example.content: This recipe was amazing! Will definitely make it again.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of posts using cursor-based pagination

patch.description: Updates an existing post with the provided content

value.content: Updated: This recipe was good but needed more seasoning.

example.content: Updated: This recipe was good but needed more seasoning.

delete.description: Removes a post by its ID

post.description: Adds the current user to the list of users who liked the specified recipe

delete.description: Removes the current user from the list of users who liked the specified recipe

post.description: Adds a like to the specified post for the currently authenticated user. If the user has already liked the post, the request will be ignored.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the post to like

delete.description: Removes the like from the specified post for the currently authenticated user. If the user has not liked the post, the request will be ignored.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the post to unlike

get.description: Retrieves the dietary restrictions, nutrition goals, and allergen information for the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Updates the dietary restrictions, nutrition goals, and allergen information for the currently authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves detailed user information based on the provided user ID. This endpoint returns user details including profile information and account status.

post.description: Creates a following relationship between the authenticated user and the target user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to follow

delete.description: Removes the following relationship between the authenticated user and the target user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to unfollow

post.description: Analyzes a food image and generates a complete recipe including ingredients, instructions, and nutritional information
Analyzes a food image to estimate nutritional content and logs it as a meal
Modifies an existing recipe based on dietary preferences, restrictions, or portion size

info.title: NutriBack API
info.description: The API endpoints and descriptions of the NutriBack API

username.description: Unique username for the user, must follow specific constraints
Unique username for the user, must follow specific constraints

password.description: Password for the user account. Must meet strong password requirements.

description.example: A rich and moist chocolate cake perfect for dessert.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients required for the recipe

totalFat.description: Total fat content per serving in grams

sugar.description: Sugar content per serving in grams

sodium.description: Sodium content per serving in milligrams

protein.description: Protein content per serving in grams

saturatedFat.description: Saturated fat content per serving in grams

carbohydrates.description: Carbohydrates content per serving in grams

fiber.description: Fiber content per serving in grams

cholesterol.description: Cholesterol content per serving in milligrams
